author: kishoreg
msg: Site checkin for project Apache Helix

author: hossman
msg: Fix SolrCloud behavior when using "hostContext" containing "_" or"/" characters.  This fix also makes SolrCloud more accepting of hostContext values with leading/trailing slashes

author: brett
msg: [CONTINUUM-2620] adjust validation to allow commonly used punctuation

author: eli
msg: HADOOP-9113. o.a.h.fs.TestDelegationTokenRenewer is failing intermittently. Contributed by Karthik Kambatla

author: julianfoad
msg: (add_file): Rearrange so that we first gather all required properties
and then set them, in anticipation of some day soon being able to
pass them to the 'wc add file' function to add the file all in one go.
